</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Detection </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns an array of all vehicles available to current client. This command returns both empty and crewed vehicles <u>but not soldiers</u>. It will also return "WeaponHolderSimulated" of dead bodies (weapon on the ground). Vehicles created with [[createVehicleLocal]] will only be returned on the client that created them. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''vehicles''' </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_vehicles = [[vehicles]];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[allCurators]], [[allGroups]], [[allDead]], [[playableUnits]], [[switchableUnits]], [[allUnitsUAV]], [[allDeadMen]], [[agents]], [[allUnits]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
